headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: name
body.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

body.name: key-type
body.description: The type of the "key" parameter.Use "predefined" for these keys: type-in-data-center, name-in-data-center, and ip-address.Use "tag" to query the Data Center tag's property.

body.name: key
body.description: Defines in which Data Center property to query.For key-type "predefined", use these keys: type-in-data-center, name-in-data-center, and ip-address.For key-type "tag", use the Data Center tag key to query.Keys are case-insensitive.

body.name: values
body.description: The value(s) of the Data Center property to match the Query Rule.Values are case-insensitive.There is an 'OR' operation between multiple values.For key-type "predefined" and key 'ip-address', the values must be an IPv4 or IPv6 address.For key-type "tag", the values must be the Data Center tag values.

body.name: key-type
body.description: The type of the "key" parameter.Use "predefined" for these keys: type-in-data-center, name-in-data-center, and ip-address.Use "tag" to query the Data Center tag's property.

body.name: key
body.description: Defines in which Data Center property to query.For key-type "predefined", use these keys: type-in-data-center, name-in-data-center, and ip-address.For key-type "tag", use the Data Center tag key to query.Keys are case-insensitive.

body.name: values
body.description: The value(s) of the Data Center property to match the Query Rule.Values are case-insensitive.There is an 'OR' operation between multiple values.For key-type "predefined" and key 'ip-address', the values must be an IPv4 or IPv6 address.For key-type "tag", the values must be the Data Center tag values.

body.name: data-centers
body.description: Collection of Data Center servers identified by the name or UID. Use "All" to select all data centers.

success.name: name
success.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

add-data-center-query key-type predefine.description: Adds new data center query with predefined query rule

add-data-center-query key-type tag.description: Adds new data center query with tag query rule
